summary.span: 通过使用指定的组合服务并禁用重新组合来组合指定的部件。

span.span: Composes the specified part by using the specified composition service, with recomposition disabled.
The composed part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与普通组合不同的是，如果目录发生更改，则不保证用此方法组成的部分保持有效 `compositionService` 。Unlike ordinary composition, parts composed with this method are not guaranteed to remain valid if the catalog behind`compositionService` changes.

span.span: or is .
An error occurred during composition.
contains a collection of errors that occurred.
The has been disposed.
